text:
MEMORIAL CENTER, PURDUE UNIVERSITY, LAFAYETTE, INDIANA
THE MIDWEST PROGRAM ON AIRBORNE TELEVISION INSTRUCTION
OFFICES ALSO IN NEW YORK AND CHICAGO
January 25, 1961
Mr. William G. Harley
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
Suite 1119 - DuPont Circle Office Bldg.
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
Thanks very much for your wonderful help with the NDEA group during
our recent Washington visit. I am certain your presence was felt
and that you made a very real contribution.
Formal congratulations on the excellent way the office appears to
be organized and functioning. This certainly is a far cry from the
old NAEB but it is much closer to what we have always wanted and
I am sure more than most of us have dared hope for. Keep up the
good work!
